main event: On 16 May 1949, at approximately 1700 hours, an object was observed flying over Davis-Monthan AFB in Tucson, Arizona.
interesting points: The object was round, flat, and black, approximately the size of a wash tub,The witness observed the object for about 8-10 seconds before it disappeared behind an aircraft hangar,It maintained a constant altitude while fluttering as it flew,The estimated speed of the object was between 800 to 1000 mph,The observer, an automobile mechanic, believed it to be a 'flying saucer'.
witness description: The observer is an automobile mechanic in the Air Force, described as above average intelligence and very reliable.
